title: Separate Constants and Variables on Either Side of the Equation
text: We must first simplify each side of the equation to get $$\operatorname{10}\left(3-16s+40\right)=600-75s$$. $$30-160s+400=600-75s$$. Now, we collect constants and variables on either side. $$-170=85s$$
